summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the issuance and sale of general negotiable bonds in an amount of not to exceed $12,000,000 for the purpose of providing funds and matching funds for capital purposes, to wit: acquisition, construction and installation of certain street and alley improvements within the City as submitted to the electors under Ordinance 96329; providing for the levy and collection of taxes in excess of the millage limitation contained in the State Constitution and State law for the payment of principal of and interest on said bonds; creating and establishing a Neighborhood Improvement Fund and a Bond Interest and Redemption Fund and pledging the levy of ad valorem taxes without limitation as to rate or amount.
